items.sentence: The audience went crazy when Tom came out on the stage.
Tom was very sure that Mary could take care of herself.
I can't afford to send my children to a private school.
Tom has been spending a lot of time with Mary recently.
Doctors took dramatic measures to save the teen's life.
I don't remember getting up in the middle of the night.
You shouldn't blame other people for your own mistakes.
Tom will be mad at Mary when he finds out what she did.
As we took off, every baby on the plane started crying.
I don't have to stand for such insolence on Tom's part.
